message: As I expected, the door opens into a single, cavernous room.
A man is standing at the center.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Ryuuhou."
The cheerful expression I've come to associate with him is markedly absent. His piercing stare gives his smile a predatory gleam.

name: 竜峰
message: "I knew you'd come."

name: 紅雀
message: "Motherfucker..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ryuuhou..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Oh! You're joining us as well? Fantastic."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't even start with that shit. I'm not letting you touch him."

name: 竜峰
message: "Oh, I'm not sure that's up to you. Who knows? Maybe Aoba'll fall right into my arms."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ryuuhou...!"
Koujaku reaches for the sword on his back. Instantly, the atmosphere in the room shifts.
It's happening again; Koujaku is losing it.

name: 紅雀
message: "Urrrgh..."
He rips the sword from its sheath and grips it in both hands. His body seems to glow with malice.

name: 竜峰
message: "Once he's mine, I'll give birth to my second greatest masterpiece... No, not second. Different. New."

name: 紅雀
message: "Like hell! You won't lay a finger on him!"

name: 竜峰
message: "Now, how many times do I have to tell you? You really need to calm down, remember?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Shut the fuck up!"
The air trembles with the force of Koujaku's roar.
I have to stop him! It's like his rage is consuming him from within.
If he lets his anger control him... If he doesn't snap out of it...
A shiver crawls up my spine. I have to stop Koujaku before it's too late.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Kouja―"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "...Aoba."
I turn to see several Beni-Shigure members standing behind me. When did they get here?

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you―"
One of them grabs me by the shoulders.
Something's wrong. I look into his face.
His eyes are dark. Empty. Lifeless, like a doll's.
I've seen eyes like these before.
Mizuki...

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Can't let you do that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking about?! If I don't do something―!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "This is what he wants. We can't let anyone stop him. Not even you."

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Let's see his battle through... together."
This is what Koujaku wants? For me to just stand here and watch?
...No! I can't let that happen!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let go...!"
I nearly manage to wrench my shoulder from the man's grip, but then the others join him to restrain me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh... Koujaku!"
Koujaku turns his head a fraction. He hears my voice. He isn't lost yet.

name: 紅雀
message: "...What are you doing to him?"

name: 竜峰
message: "Shall I let you in on a little secret?"
Ryuuhou indicates me and the Beni-Shigures.

name: 竜峰
message: "You see those wounds on their necks? They all have them... even Aoba."
I force my head to the side to look at the neck of the guy next to me.
He has a mark that looks like it was made with a heavy gauge needle.

There's something like that on my neck, too?
Wait... Koujaku mentioned something...
Something about needle marks on my neck...

name: 紅雀
message: "What the fuck did you do to them?!"

name: 竜峰
message: "See, I fell for Aoba here the moment I saw him near the club. I just had to give him a little poke."

name: 竜峰
message: "Just a little drug that makes the mind... unravel. I was dying to see how Aoba would... come undone. You showed up just as things were getting good."

name: 竜峰
message: "But I knew you would, sooner or later. I'd been planning for it since I learned you were here."

name: 竜峰
message: "I had two goals: Aoba... and you. I needed to stoke that fire in your belly, to feed my flower, to watch it grow."

name: 竜峰
message: "While you were out looking for me, I made a few trips to the Old Residential District. That's when I met your friends here."

name: 紅雀
message: "What?! You didn't..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Oh, I did. You remember my needle, don't you? The passion. The heat. How it sinks through the skin and pierces the heart..."

name: 竜峰
message: "All it takes is one little prick. They hardly feel a thing―like the touch of a mosquito."

name: 竜峰
message: "They were my puppets before you broke into my room."
With a gleeful smile, Ryuuhou claps once.
One of the Beni-Shigures grabs my arm and twists.
Though I wasn't paying attention, I recall hearing a clap earlier, too.
Is that how he's controlling them?

name: 竜峰
message: "And now, their lives are in our hands."

name: 紅雀
message: "You're not getting away with this, you piece of shit! I'm gonna bash your fucking head in, right here, right now!"

name: 竜峰
message: "Hehe. You really have forgotten my warning."

name: 竜峰
message: "You were just a child when I carved that tattoo on your back. That's why you were able to come back. Luck."

name: 竜峰
message: "But I warned you that would change when you got older. I told you to be careful."

name: 竜峰
message: "Or have you forgotten... how you killed your mother?"

name: 紅雀
message: "DON'T SAY IT!"
A howl tears from Koujaku's throat. His body seems to double in size.
Am I hallucinating? ...No.

name: 紅雀
message: "Grrrrrh, gaaaaaaah!"
His muscles bulge. His top rips open, no longer able to contain them.
With his upper body exposed, the tattoo on his back is exposed as well.
The sight makes me shiver.
What was a striking field of peonies before has now transformed into something different.
The flowers are glowing a brilliant red, the color of raw flesh, and the shape has extended to cover his entire left arm.
It's like the tattoo itself is alive...

name: 紅雀
message: "Guuhhh..."
Koujaku's breaths are panting, wild and feral. His eyes are empty of all emotion save rage and hate.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku!"
I call his name with all my might, but it doesn't reach him.

name: 竜峰
message: "Ahh... Incredible."
Ryuuhou gazes upon Koujaku's altered form, a wide grin spreading his lips.

name: 竜峰
message: "You see, your tattoo was something of an experiment. Not how I'd describe it, of course... but it was a personal request from Toue himself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Toue?!"

name: 竜峰
message: "A tattoo is destiny, understand? A man carries his ink for the rest of his life. That's why you need to be committed―not just the subject, but the artist as well."

name: 竜峰
message: "Toue's been researching mind control for decades. Somewhere along the line, he heard about me. He came to me with an idea."

name: 竜峰
message: "He wondered if it might be possible to control people with tattoos. Naturally, I thought the idea was fascinating. You were chosen for this little experiment."

name: 竜峰
message: "And now, my tattoo has devoured your heart, and is becoming something new. I warned you about letting emotion take control, but you never listen, do you?"

name: 竜峰
message: "The tattoo grew with you. It was still immature back then. That's why the rage never took you completely."

name: 竜峰
message: "But now you're fully grown, and so is the tattoo. The stronger your rage, the deeper it drank, until it grew enough to consume your soul."

name: 竜峰
message: "The tattoo and you are one! Now, it will flourish! With your beating heart as its soil, it will bloom beyond my wildest dreams!"
Ryuuhou spreads his arms wide, an expression of utter bliss on his face.

name: 竜峰
message: "I have no regrets. When your reason and my passion clashed, I came out the winner. Now, to claim my prize..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Take me with you."

name: 紅雀
message: "RYUUHOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! Koujaku, stop!"
But my voice is powerless to reach him.
Koujaku raises his sword and charges.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku!"
A sickening sound echoes through the room.
Koujaku, with the strength of unbridled hatred, has driven his sword through Ryuuhou's chest.
Where it emerges from Ryuuhou's back, bright rivers of blood fall to the floor.

Ryuuhou stoops forward, blood spurting from his mouth.
...He's laughing.

name: 竜峰
message: "...Hahah, ngh... Killed... by my own masterpiece... What... an honor! Hngh!"
A last font of blood erupts from his smiling lips...
And then his head falls limp.
Koujaku tears his blade free.
A dark black stain blooms across the front of Ryuuhou's kimono, and then his body crumples to the floor.
